content:
Sure, here's a script for depression:

"Depression can be a heavy weight on your shoulders, but it doesn't have to be. Take the first step towards feeling better with EGG™. Hold it in your left hand and let the low-frequency electrotherapy work its magic. Twist the egg to adjust the intensity and let it work for 15 minutes per session. Don't let depression hold you back any longer. Try EGG™ today."

This can be accompanied by footage of someone holding the EGG™ in their left hand, with some before-and-after shots to show the positive effects.
